name: Sandcastles in the Sand
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Kourtney Kang, Joe Kelly (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Robin gives romance a second try with an old boyfriend, only to have him break her heart...again.
